title: What are some extremely strict rules BTS needs to follow? - Quora

response.answer_text: even starting out, they didn’t have many strict rules compared to other idols. I think this was the case because they originally weren’t a generic kpop group, and their target audience was initially more guys than girls, so they didn’t have a dating ban in their first contract (i’m not sure if a dating ban will be implemented in the new contract). dieting was something encouraged, but not forced. Bighit was a small company, and BTS was very unpopular back then, so they were put on a year-long diet to lose weight. they followed this, but nowadays you’ll catch some members eating whatever they want (like Jungkook, because he works out a lot and needs more food anyway, and Tae, who doesn’t care much about his weight or diet. you’ll notice that in the past year or so he gained a little bit of weight, he got quite fluffy and i alw uwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwu really hard seeing his fluffiness, and the others who have a fast metabolism. either way, they watch what they eat to avoid brutal comments on weight gain from the cruel knetz). if a member wishes to lose weight, they will choose to diet, and the staff will encourage it. after all, their message is to promote freedom of speech, so it would be very hypocritical for them to be controlled. the point is, they are very responsible and know what’s best and what’s not. they’ll lose weight if they need to fit the standard, and they’ll do what they need to to appeal to the public while maintaining their best selves.

•No drunk tweeting •no showing skin ( ever wonder why on RunBts or BV they go swimming fully clothed?) •no swearing or offensive language •informing the company of their whereabouts at all times for security reasons •informing the company of travel plans and who they are traveling with for security reasons •no PUBLIC dating.There is debate about the no dating rule but I believe what goes on in secret goes on, but PUBLIC romance or dating of any kind is not permitted •diet, weight, appearance standards •adhere to the schedule ALL of the BTS members have at one time or another disobeyed these rules except for PUBLIC DATING. Depite all these rules they have actually been given a lot more freedom than other KPop group
